name: UFractureRecomputeNormalsSettings
doc: Settings for visualizing and recomputing normals and tangents

bShowTangents: Whether to display tangent and bitangent vectors
Length: Length of display normal and tangent vectors
bOnlyTangents: Whether to only recompute tangents, and leave normals as they were
bRecomputeSharpEdges: If true, update where edges are 'sharp' by comparing adjacent triangle face normals vs the Sharp Edge Angle Threshold.
SharpEdgeAngleThreshold: Threshold on angle of change in face normals across an edge, above which we create a sharp edge if bRecomputeSharpEdges is true
bOnlyInternalSurfaces: Whether to only change internal surface normals / tangents
